name: Deep Zone (prototype)
description:
Controls:

"W" = up

"S" = down

"J" = shoot

"K" = gamble

"R" = respawn

dodge bullets, and shoot weirdos.

Once you've saved up 250 Space Coins you can gamble them on randomized power ups (theres only two so far :-( ). The power ups will spawn from the right side of the screen and move towards the left side where you must collide with them to collect.
